title: Chapter 955 - Petting A Cat
volume_title: A Sword Cleaves A Path Through The Netherworld
body:
Chapter 955 - Petting A Cat

Within the courtyard, the lamplight swayed, and the atmosphere was strange.

However, both Su Yi and the Netherworld King were perfectly relaxed and content.

Seeing this, the other three old-timers all felt rather conflicted.

“Fellow Daoist, what have you come here for?” The Netherworld King supported her jaw with her hand, tilted her head, and batted her eyes at Su Yi.

“I’m here to trade something and ask a few questions while I’m at it,” Su Yi said casually. “You?”

The Netherworld King pressed her lips into a smile. “Much like you, there are a few things I’d like to ask about.”

Su Yi suddenly asked, “Are they connected to the Far Shore?”

The Far Shore!

Qu Boling and Zhan Beiqi’s expressions were a bit strange, while Wang Chonglu was dazed. Something didn’t seem quite right here.

Why would Su Yi suddenly use the Far Shore to probe that mysterious woman? Is there some secret behind it?

The Netherworld King narrowed her eyes and said with surprise, “If I’m not mistaken, you arrived in the City of Eternal Night today. I truly wouldn’t have expected you to have learned about this faction so soon.”

Su Yi laughed....
